function: Render the primary UI layout with consistent styling using a white background and navy components.
static_description: The page displays a clean, minimalistic layout with a white background. All interactive elements such as buttons, inputs, and dropdowns use navy color. The header includes branding/logo area. Main content area contains the search bar, report options panel, and results section.

resource_dependency.input_placeholder_text: Enter stock symbol or company name...

function: Allow users to input stock codes or names for querying available stocks.
static_description: A centered search input field appears prominently on the homepage. It features a placeholder text: 'Enter stock symbol or company name...' and is styled with navy borders and text. A magnifying glass icon is displayed inside the right edge of the input field.

interaction_and_states.description: Focuses the input field when clicked.
Triggers submission of entered value to initiate a stock lookup via the /api/stocks/search endpoint.

function: Provide controls for selecting desired report format and content sections.
static_description: Below the search bar, two panels appear: one labeled 'Report Format' showing a dropdown menu with options ['PDF Report', 'Excel Summary', 'HTML View'], and another labeled 'Content Sections' listing checkboxes for ['Basic Info', 'Market Trends', 'Financial Data']. Both controls are styled with navy accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the dropdown toggles visibility of format options. Clicking checkboxes selects/deselects respective content items.

function: Trigger generation of customized reports based on selected parameters.
static_description: A large, navy-colored 'Generate Report' button spans below the selection panels. When inactive, it has reduced opacity; becomes fully opaque upon valid selections.

interaction_and_states.description: Submits current form data (selected stock, format, and content) to the /api/reports/generate endpoint. Displays loading indicator while processing.

function: Display dynamically generated stock reports containing requested information.
static_description: After successful report generation, this section expands beneath the controls. It shows structured report segments including basic info cards, market trend visualization, and financial tables, all presented against a white background with navy headings.

resource_dependency.external_stock_api_integration: Real-time stock price and metadata API
resource_dependency.analysis_engine_api: API providing predictive analytics and historical comparisons

function: Fetch live stock data and analytical insights through integrated external services.
static_description: This component handles backend-to-API communication without visible frontend representation. All fetched data populates into the report display areas after request completion.

resource_dependency.database_schema_instructions: Create tables: stocks(stock_id, symbol, name, sector), reports(report_id, user_selections, created_at, file_path)

function: Establish secure connection between application server and PostgreSQL instance using predefined credentials.
static_description: Backend configuration module initializes database connectivity at startup using provided environment variables. Schema definitions ensure proper storage of stock records and generated reports metadata.

function: Enable programmatic querying of stock symbols or company names against stored or external datasets.
static_description: RESTful GET endpoint accepts query parameter '?q=' and returns matching stock entries. Used by frontend autocomplete feature and direct searches.

function: Expose endpoints for retrieving time-series market movements and corporate financial statements.
static_description: Two distinct endpoints serve specific data types: /api/market/trends provides aggregated index movement over periods, and /api/stocks/{symbol}/financials delivers quarterly/yearly revenue/profit figures per stock.

resource_dependency.report_generation_logic: Combine selected stock data + user preferences → template engine → output formatter

function: Process user-selected configurations into downloadable or viewable reports in chosen formats.
static_description: Server-side logic orchestrates multi-source data compilation and applies appropriate formatting templates before returning final document. Supports PDF, Excel, and HTML outputs.

function: Present feedback during asynchronous operations and inform users about issues gracefully.
static_description: During data fetch or report creation, a centrally positioned spinner animation replaces or overlays relevant sections. Upon failure, contextual error messages replace loading states with clear resolution guidance.

resource_dependency.responsive_breakpoints: {mobile: max-width 768px, tablet: min-width 769px and max-width 1024px, desktop: min-width 1025px}
resource_dependency.adaptive_layout_rules: Stack vertical elements on small screens; maintain horizontal alignment above tablet size

function: Ensure optimal usability and readability across various screen sizes and device types.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly depending on viewport dimensions. Inputs, selections, and reports stack vertically on mobile devices but align side-by-side on tablets and desktops.

resource_dependency.npm_script_install_all: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
resource_dependency.npm_script_dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"

function: Automate setup and local development workflows via unified command-line interfaces.
static_description: Root-level package.json defines custom scripts install:all and dev which manage dependency installation and concurrent execution of frontend/backend development servers respectively.
